revision.text: Possibly: An Essay on the Nature and Cure of the Phthisis Pulmonalis. The second edition enlarged. To which is added An appendix on the use and effects of frequent vomits. By Thomas Reid, M.D. F.A.S. (By Reid, Thomas). (London : Printed for T. Cadel in the Strand., M. DCC. LXXXV. [1785]). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2506020~S1
